languages.text: "Находку уцелевшего шаттла в этом пылающем аду можно будет смело приравнять к чуду Бога-Императора".
"If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Находку уцелевшего шаттла в этом пылающем аду можно будет смело приравнять к чуду Бога-Императора".

traits.locale_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果能在这种活生生的地狱里找到一架完整的穿梭机，那恐怕真的是神皇赐予的奇迹了。”
languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “如果能在这种活生生的地狱里找到一架完整的穿梭机，那恐怕真的是神皇赐予的奇迹了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Si conseguimos encontrar una lanzadera intacta en este infierno ardiente, será por un milagro del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Si conseguimos encontrar una lanzadera intacta en este infierno ardiente, será por un milagro del Dios Emperador».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「この燃え盛る地獄絵図の中で無傷のシャトルを見つけることができるならば、まさに神帝陛下の奇跡と言えよう」
languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「この燃え盛る地獄絵図の中で無傷のシャトルを見つけることができるならば、まさに神帝陛下の奇跡と言えよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn es uns gelingt, in dieser brennenden Hölle ein intaktes Shuttle zu finden, wäre das ein vom Gottimperator geschicktes Wunder."
languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es uns gelingt, in dieser brennenden Hölle ein intaktes Shuttle zu finden, wäre das ein vom Gottimperator geschicktes Wunder."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si nous parvenons à trouver une navette en état de marche dans ce brasier, ce sera un miracle envoyé par l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Si nous parvenons à trouver une navette en état de marche dans ce brasier, ce sera un miracle envoyé par l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu alevlere boğulmuş cehennemde çalışır durumda bir mekik bulabilmemiz Tanrı İmparator'dan ihsan edilmiş bir mucize olur."
languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Bu alevler içindeki cehennemde çalışır durumda bir mekik bulmayı başarırsak Tanrı İmparator bize bir mucize ihsan etmiş demektir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "If we manage to find an intact shuttle in this burning hellscape, it will be a miracle sent by the God-Emperor."
